data.name: Button Button
data.detailed_description:
Button Bros is a button party adventure story game that combines single player, cooperation and battle. In addition to the operations of other platform jump games, we have also added an unusual play mechanism. You can use a series of useful skills at will, including sewing buttons in the air to achieve stagnation, kicking other buttons to avoid or shift, and blocking dangerous lasers of the same color as yourself. Attention! Don‘t touch any laser different from your own color, it will burn you up!

Abundant game modes


  • You can choose all kinds of happy game modes - single entry, double cooperation and four-person competition, each with its own unique play and level design!
  • This wonderful game will be updated continuously. We plan to update the content publicly and regularly. There are new game modes, roles, levels and even new ways to play!

Single entry


  • This is an exciting one-man sport, a unique operation. In addition to the basic platform jumping operations, we have added the operation of jumping into big buttons to absorb in the air, and flexibly use this operation to pass through various checkpoints!
  • Unique game style and role, buttons of four colors correspond to four different levels respectively, four carefully designed maps, each has very rich game mechanism and decryption levels, each small level can play to another completely different game experience, levels can also collect various small gifts, collect small gifts in the store to exchange your favorite clothing!
  • Attention! We will open the single entry mode at the same time after the game is officially launched.

Double cooperation


  • The abundant content consists of three double checkpoints, each with a boss checkpoint, all kinds of obstacles to build up infinite patterns of checkpoints!
  • Two people play together can get more fun, using the button shape change to cover teammates through many obstacles! Cooperate with your friends and think harder to pass the barrier!
  • There is no guarantee that the friendship boat will turn over or not. Spend your time trying to get through the finish line and get familiar with the operation. One day you can also become a jump master!
  • Although the game is designed for two people, we have introduced a single challenge mode. You can use the keyboard or the handle to operate two characters to go through customs alone, or you can use the handle to complete a single challenge mode to win a single achievement. Some extremely difficult levels may still call for help from your peers.

Panzer bandit


  • Many weapons! Use weapons such as missiles, mines and traps to eliminate your friends!
  • The four-person local online self-hi mode is easy to use, fast paced and full of joy!
  • Map with different styles between single mode and double mode, cartoon style with infinite joy!
  • The platform for four players to compete is to gain points through their weapons and their own strength. Of course, you can also run away and survive, which is victory! You can also target the player with the highest score in the game to get anti - kill!
  • If you don’t like the elimination mode, you can try the occupation mode. Here you can only occupy the stronghold and score!
  • Against more than ten different terrains, beware of traps on individual maps! Let’s have a brutal fight with friends on the sofa!



  • The new content such as game modes, roles and new features will be updated regularly, so that good friends can turn over their friendship boats at any time during the game.

Attention!


Game support: 1 or 4 handles, multiple keyboards. It’s up to you. Of course, we strongly recommend handle operation: D
( Only 4 players can play at most )

Main features

  • Three different experience game modes
  • Unique retro pixel style
  • The cool cooperation that can’t be missed
  • Hard core game experience
  • All kinds of checkpoints
  • Steam achievements, Cloud Storage, Interchange Cards ( Later )
  • Interesting hidden levels await your exploration.

data.short_description: Button Bros is a two-player platformer puzzle-solving game. Players need to use limited resources to help their partner passing different laser obstacles. This two brothers are going share their weal and woe to complete a fantastic adventure by the lead of Mr. Bunny.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (Windows 8 is not officially supported)
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 4 years (Pixel Shader 3.0, Vertex Shader 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: With the right drivers the game supports the Microsoft® Xbox 360, Sony PS3/PS4 controllers.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7 through 10.9 have been tested.
  • Processor: Intel based Macs only.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 4 years (Pixel Shader 3.0, Vertex Shader 3.0)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
